attributes.action: Alter the petition system on this site to allow citizens to vote up or vote down petitions...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the system available on this site may give a one sided slant to each petition. By altering it to allow citizens to not only vote for it, but vote against it, it would bring it more in keeping with the democratic process of this nation

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
